com.digi.xbee.api

Class RemoteZigBeeDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.AbstractXBeeDevice
      • com.digi.xbee.api.RemoteXBeeDevice
        • com.digi.xbee.api.RemoteZigBeeDevice

  • public class RemoteZigBeeDevice
extends RemoteXBeeDevice
    This class represents a remote ZigBee device.
    See Also:
    RemoteDigiMeshDevice, RemoteDigiPointDevice, RemoteRaw802Device, RemoteThreadDevice, RemoteXBeeDevice

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteZigBeeDevice

        public RemoteZigBeeDevice(AbstractXBeeDevice localXBeeDevice,
                          XBee64BitAddress addr64)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteZigBeeDevice object with the given local XBeeDevice which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local XBee device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote ZigBee device.
        addr64 - The 64-bit address to identify this remote ZigBee device.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true or if localXBeeDevice.getXBeeProtocol() != XBeeProtocol.ZIGBEE.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if addr64 == null.
        See Also:
        XBee64BitAddress

      • RemoteZigBeeDevice

        public RemoteZigBeeDevice(AbstractXBeeDevice localXBeeDevice,
                          XBee64BitAddress addr64,
                          XBee16BitAddress addr16,
                          String ni)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteZigBeeDevice object with the given local XBeeDevice which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local XBee device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote ZigBee device.
        addr64 - The 64-bit address to identify this remote ZigBee device.
        addr16 - The 16-bit address to identify this remote ZigBee device. It might be null.
        ni - The node identifier of this remote ZigBee device. It might be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true or if localXBeeDevice.getXBeeProtocol() != XBeeProtocol.ZIGBEE.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if addr64 == null.
        See Also:
        XBee16BitAddress, XBee64BitAddress

      • RemoteZigBeeDevice

        public RemoteZigBeeDevice(ZigBeeDevice localXBeeDevice,
                          XBee64BitAddress addr64)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteZigBeeDevice object with the given local ZigBeeDevice which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local ZigBee device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote ZigBee device.
        addr64 - The 64-bit address to identify this remote ZigBee device.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if addr64 == null.
        See Also:
        XBee64BitAddress

    • Method Detail

      • forceDisassociate

        public void forceDisassociate()
                       throws TimeoutException,
                              XBeeException
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Forces this XBee device to immediately disassociate from the network and re-attempt to associate.

        Only valid for End Devices.

        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if there is a timeout executing the disassociation command.
        XBeeException - if there is any other XBee related exception.
        See Also:
        AbstractXBeeDevice.getAssociationIndicationStatus()

      • getAssociationIndicationStatus

        public AssociationIndicationStatus getAssociationIndicationStatus()
                                                           throws TimeoutException,
                                                                  XBeeException
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns the current association status of this XBee device.

        It indicates occurrences of errors during the last association request.

        Returns:
        The association indication status of the XBee device.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if there is a timeout getting the association indication status.
        XBeeException - if there is any other XBee related exception.
        See Also:
        AbstractXBeeDevice.forceDisassociate(), AssociationIndicationStatus

      • getXBeeProtocol

        public XBeeProtocol getXBeeProtocol()
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns the XBee Protocol of this XBee device.

        To refresh this value use the AbstractXBeeDevice.readDeviceInfo() method.

        Overrides:
        getXBeeProtocol in class AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns:
        The XBee device protocol.
        See Also:
        XBeeProtocol
